description: A school based on project-based learning where I developed my autonomy as well as teamwork skills. I coded numerous projects in C, C++, Python, React, and more, both individually and in groups. One of the school's core principles is teaching us how to learn, which gives me an advantage in mastering any new technology.
Completed 13 different projects based on Solana blockchain technology. Learned principles such as: liquidity pools, minting and managing NFTs, smart contract security, etc.
